ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.scheme

Class Scheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.scheme.Scheme
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ARKButcherTableau, ERKButcherTableau, ForwardEulerTableau, StormerVerletTableau

    public abstract class Scheme
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that defines a method scheme, including the order, coefficients, and any other essential properties. Ernst Hairer, Syvert Norsett, and Gerhard Wanner. "Solving Order Differential Equations I, 2nd Edition", pg.135. Christopher A. Kennedy, Mark H. Carpenter. "Additive Runge-Kutta schemes for convection-diffusion-reaction equations.". Applied numerical mathematics, vol. 44, pg.139-181, 2003.

    • Method Detail

      • is_single

        public abstract boolean is_single()
        Finds if this tableau is just one Butcher Tableau and not an additive Runge-Kutta tableau.
        Returns:
        true if this has only one piece.

      • is_additive

        public abstract boolean is_additive()
        Finds if this tableau is an additive RK tableau.
        Returns:
        true to indicate that this tableau has two additive parts.

      • is_FSAL

        public abstract boolean is_FSAL()
        Finds if this tableau has the First-Same-As-Last (FSAL) property.
        Returns:
        true if this has the FSAL property

      • get_order

        public abstract int get_order()
        Finds the order of convergence for this method.
        Returns:
        The order of the method.

      • has_emb

        public abstract boolean has_emb()
        Finds if this tableau has an embedded method.
        Returns:
        true if this tableau has a embedded method.

      • get_scheme_order

        public abstract int get_scheme_order()
        Finds the order of convergence for the main method.
        Returns:
        The order of the main method.

      • get_emb_order

        public abstract int get_emb_order()
        Finds the order of convergence for the embedded method.
        Returns:
        The order of convergence of the method or null if there is no embedded method.

      • get_high_order

        public int get_high_order()
        Finds the larger of the embedded and main order of convergences.
        Returns:
        The larger of the orders.

      • get_interpolant

        public Interpolant get_interpolant()
        Get the interpolant for this tableau used for dense output.
        Returns:
        The interpolant, or null if null if it does not have one.

      • get_order_interpolant

        public int get_order_interpolant()
        Return the order of the interpolant used for dense output.
        Returns:
        The order of the interpolant or null if it does not have one.

      • get_name

        public java.lang.String get_name()
        Get the name for this tableau.
        Returns:
        The interpolant, or null if null if it does not have one.
